hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class ReactiveObservableWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.ReactiveObservableWrapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the wrapped observable's element type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable<T>

    public class ReactiveObservableWrapper<T>
extends Observable
implements Observable<T>
    Wrapper for an existing reactive-observable and maps its features to the java-observable.

    Removes all registered java-observers in case an error or finish is received.

    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.11.

public Closeable register(@Nonnull

        Registers an observer for the notification of Ts.

      • register

        @Nonnull
public Closeable register(@Nonnull
                         Observer observer)
        Registers a java-observer and returns a handle to it. The observer can be unregistered via this handle or the regular deleteObserver().

        The convenience method is to have symmetric means for both observer kinds to interact with this observable.

        Parameters:
        observer - the observer to register
        Returns:
        the unregistration handle
